name: A Game of Thrones: Visual Novel
name_original: A Game of Thrones: Visual Novel
description:
A GAME OF THRONES : VISUAL NOVEL

Based on George Martin's book series. The game will pass during the reign of King Robert. You will witness the adventures of Fred Rathunter, who left his family titles and lands to join the Night's Watch. We are working on it and we need support for this. Every donation you make through Patreon is very important to us. Have a nice day!

My illustrators are working hard to make drawings of the game. And I need money for more illustrators and music producers.

https://www.patreon.com/keremaygun

Please support via Patreon...
